description: This is a pretty easy 8KM round trip trail.  The trail itself is an abandoned path that was once used for OHVs to get to the top of Bluehill.  Its very secluded and the scenery is quite nice.
directions:
Take TSHP RD 312 west of Sundre.
Go 10km W of Sundre on 584 (don't turn N on 22)
Turn S down Coal Camp Road (RR63)
Follow it 5km, turn S on RR64
Follow RR64 25.6km as it winds SW and turns into RR64A, then into Township Road 314A then 80A, then 311A then 312.  Trailhead is on the N side of road.
title: Bluehill Trail
